content.html: We tend to judge things based on when *we* started, but that's different for everyone. Reexamine what you know, says @swyx. css-tricks.com/its-always-yea…
content.value: We tend to judge things based on when *we* started, but that's different for everyone. Reexamine what you know, says @swyx. css-tricks.com/its-always-yea…

content.html: One thing I learned from getting published in @CSS Tricks is the *sheer amount* of sites that solely exist to repost CSS Tricks. I made an open source domain blocklist of these spam sites: github.com/sw-yx/domainbl… Anyone know why they do this? They set canonicals to themselves..
content.value:
One thing I learned from getting published in @CSS Tricks is the *sheer amount* of sites that solely exist to repost CSS Tricks.

I made an open source domain blocklist of these spam sites: github.com/sw-yx/domainbl…

Anyone know why they do this? They set canonicals to themselves..
